E la manieyra del eyssiment de la urina per aquel es que prenguas le fiel doblat e lies en la extramitat de lu lana o coto per bona liadura; e entrometas las extramitatz del fiel en la partida dejos de la ciringua, e inscideys am las forfexs si superflueys alcuna causa de la lana, mays intromet la en la canula am vehemencia E aprop enongeys la ciringua am boder e am album de huou.	And the method of removing urine with it is to take the thread and soak it in the end of the syringe in wool or cloth with a good grip; and insert the ends of the thread into the opening at the tip of the syringe, and with the forceps, if there is any excess caused by the wool, but otherwise insert it into the cane with force. Then push the syringe in with force and with the white of an egg.
E fay cezer le malaute sobre la selha, e embroca la vesiqua de lu e la vergua am olis umitz, e oli de oliva e ayguaros.	And have the patient lie down on his back, and open his bladder and cervix with oils, and olive oil and water.
E aprop entromet la ciringua am facilitat entro que pervengua a la razit de la vergua; e aprop dobla la vergua desus a la partida del embelic; e aprop empelleys la ciringua dintz aquela; e aprop empelleys aquela entro que pervengua a la vesica, e aquela centa le malaute esser pervenguda a la causa vuoda, e no es fayt asso segon aquest orde, sino le meat en le qual va a tortuositat.	Then insert the syringe with ease until it reaches the root of the cervix; then bend the cervix above at the point of the embelic; and squeeze the syringe within that; and squeeze it until it reaches the bladder, and let the patient be bent so that the cause is vacated, and not done according to this order, but the part in which there is tortuosity.
E aprop exten le fiel am la lana petit a petit, quar la urina siec la lana.	Then slowly pull out the thread with the wool, for the urine will suck up the wool.
Aprop extratz aquela e fay per curacio urina, e usa ciringua, no cesses fer aquo e usa ciringua entro que sia evacuada la vesica e le malaute atrobe alleviacio.	Then pull it out and let the urine be passed through treatment; use the syringe, do not stop using it until the bladder is evacuated and the patient feels relief.
Capitol .lix.	Chapter .LIX.
De qualitat de clisterizacio de la vezica am clampcedra e am semblantz instrumentz les quals sian acordants ad aquo.	Of the quality of catheterization of the bladder with a syringe and similar instruments that are suited to it.
Quan accideys en la vesica ulceracio o apostema, o sanc congilat en aquela, o es coartat poyredura, e vols en aquela destillar ayguas e medicinas, lahoras sia fayt am instrument le qual es apelat clampcedra, e aquesta es la forma de lu:	When there occurs in the bladder ulceration or apostome, or congealed blood in it, or swelling is constricted, and you want to distil waters and medicines into it, then have it done with an instrument called a syringe, and this is its form:
sino que en la extramitat de lu es sorda, so es clausa.	Except that in its tip there is no hole, it is closed.
Et en aquela so tres traucs: dos de la una partida , ayssi quo vezes.	And in it are three holes: two on one side, thus alternately.
En le comensament es loc concau, en le qual es aquo que es enpellit, e sia segon quantitat que oppile aquel, ses addicio, entro que quan alcuna causa es ab aquel tirada de las humiditatz, sia atirada, e quan es expellida, am aquo sia atirada, e quan es expellit lonc, segon que fa clampcedra am la qual es phicat naphta en las batalhas de mar.	In its beginning there is a hollow place, in which it is inserted, and let the amount of fluid opilate that, when a cause is added to it, then it is drawn up; and when it is expelled, with it is expelled, and when it is pushed out from far within, according to how the syringe is pushed with the hand that holds it.
Donc cum tu vols prohicir humiditatz en la vesica, entromet la extremitat de clapcedra en la humiditat, e atira am aquel aquo que es empellit a las partidas desus, quar la humiditat es atirada en la conquavitat de clapcedra.	Therefore, when you want to inject fluid into the bladder, insert the tip of the syringe into the opening, and push with that which is pushed from above, for the fluid is drawn up into the hollow of the syringe.
E aprop entromet la extramitat de clapcedra en la vergua segon que havem recomtat en la ciringua; e aprop empelleys la humiditat am aquo que empelleys, quar aquela humiditat perve a la vesica tantost, e le malaute cent aquela.	Then insert the tip of the syringe into the cervix according to what we have said about the syringe; and squeeze the fluid with that which is squeezed, for that fluid will pass at once into the bladder, and the patient will feel it.
Forma del cristeri subtil am le qual la vesica es cristerizada, e es aquela la forma:	Form of the hollow needle with which the bladder is catheterized, and this is its form:
E sia fayta de argent o de lato, de la qual le cap pus aut sia semblant a petita pluma, e dejos lu cana dedintz liament.	And let it be made of silver or brass, the tip of which is like a little feather, and below that there is a cane.
E aprop pren vesica de moto, e pausa en aquela la humiditat que vols cristirizar en la vesica, e aprop lia aquela entre dos am fort liguatura am fiel doble, e escalfa aquela humiditat sobre le foc.	Then take the bladder and place in it the fluid that you want to inject into the bladder; then insert it between two with a strong ligature with a thread, and heat that fluid over the fire.
E aprop entromet la extremitat del cristeri en la vergua.	Then insert the tip of the needle into the cervix.
E aprop estrenh la tua ma sobre la vesica am la humiditat am strectura descent entro que·l malaute centa que aquela humiditat ja es pervenguda a la vesica.	Then squeeze your hand over the bladder with the fluid with firm pressure until the patient feels that the fluid has reached the bladder.
Mays si a tu no es present vesica, lahoras tu pren una pessa de parguames e fay de aquel cercle; e perfora aquel de tota la sua retonditat; e aprop entromet fiel fort en aquels traucs, ayssi quo so revolgut; e aprop agregua le cercle ayssi quo es agreguat alsofatur, pus que tu pausas en aquel aquo que tu vols de las humiditatz, e olis e ayguas.	But if you do not have a bladder, then take a piece of parchment and make it into a ring; and perforate it all around its circumference; then insert a strong thread through those holes, so that it is wound tightly; and add the ring thus made as you would also add a ball, by pushing it in where you want to inject the fluids, oils, and water.
E aprop tu lia aquel en le instrument e fay am aquel ayssi cum has fayt am la vesica, e exprescio am la tua ma entro que la humiditat pervengua a la vesica.	Then you hold that in the instrument and do with it as you would have done with the bladder, and express it with your hand until the fluid reaches the bladder.
Capitol .lx.	Chapter 60.
De extraccio de peyra.	Of the Extraction of Stone.
Nos ja havem dit en la divisio las specias de peyra e curacio de lu am medicinas, e la diferencia entre peyra engendrada en los ronhos e peyra engendrada en la vesica, e les senhals de aquela.	We have already spoken in the division of the species of stone and its cure by medicine, and the difference between stone generated in the kidneys and stone generated in the bladder, and their signs.
E havem dit la peyra en la qual catz operacio am ma, e seccio.	And we have spoken of the stone for which cauterization is used, and incision.
E la peyra engendrada en la vesica propriament es aquela que es ficada en la vesica.	And the stone generated in the bladder properly speaking is that which is lodged in the bladder.
E yeu so narrant aquel am exposicio manifesta e abreviacio.	And I have given an explicit account and summary of this.
Donc dic que peyra engendrada en la vesica majorment ve als enfantz; e dels senhals de lu es que la urina que es eyssida de la vesica es semblant a aygua en la sua subtilitat, e apar en aquela arena; e le malaute fregua la sua vergua, e motas veguadas pen, e aprop es dressada; e am aquo yeys foro le cul en motz de aquels.	Therefore I say that stone generated in the bladder mostly affects children; and of its signs are that the urine which is passed from the bladder is like water in its thinness, and appears to be sand; and the patient grinds his loins, and often passes water, and is frequently erect; and with this there are pains in many parts of the body.
E es laugiera la sanacio dels enfants de aquela entro que han conseguitz xiiii ans; e es dificil curacio en les viels.	And the cure is easier in children who have reached the age of 14; and it is difficult to cure the old.
Mays en les joves es migiera per aquo quar es entre aquels.	But in the young it may be cured by cauterization, which is suitable for them.
E de aquel del qual la peyra es major e la curacio es pus leugiera; E si es pauca, es contraria ad aquela.	And if the stone is large and its cure more difficult, then it is otherwise.
Donc cum pervenem a la curacio de aquela, cove al comensament de aquela que mondifiquem le malaute am cristeri le qual extragua tota la fenda la qual es en les sieus budels; quar aquela fenda alcunas veguadas prohibeys la envencio de la peyra deves la inquisicio de lu.	Therefore when we come to the cure of this, it is advisable at the beginning that we cleanse the patient by cauterization in order to open up the passage which is in his intestines; for this passage sometimes blocks the expulsion of the stone as a result of the examination.
E aprop sia pres le malaute am les sieus pes e sia contosit e maugut enjos per so que la peyra descenda al preon de la vesica, o que saute de loc aut alcunas veguadas.	And then let him be placed on his feet and made to move about and jump up and down in order that the stone may descend into the bottom of the bladder, or that it may drop out by itself at some other place.
E aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas preparat, e las mas de lu sian dejos las coysas de lu, per so que la vesica tota sia fayta declinant a las partidas dejos.	And then let the patient lie on his back with his thighs drawn up and his legs bent under him, in order that the whole bladder may be made to decline towards its lower parts.
E aprop perquier aquela e tota aquela deforo.	And then let him void all of this.
Donc si sentes la peyra en l’espazi, lahoras tu te coyta tantost am seccio sobre lu.	Therefore if you feel the stone in the passage, then immediately cauterize it there.
E si no catz de tot dejos le tieu tocament, lahoras cove que tu untes am oli le tieu dit indic de la ma sinistra, si malaute es enfant, o le dit miga si es jove complit, e entrometas aquel en le sieu cul.	And if it does not come out by itself, then let you smear your left forefinger with oil (if the patient is a child) or your middle finger (if he is grown up), and insert that into his anus.
E perquier de la peyra entro que stia dejos le tieu dit.	And push the stone out by means of your finger.
E converteys aquela petit a petit entro al col de la vesica.	And gradually draw it into the neck of the bladder.
E aprop prem sobre aquel am lo tieu dit, e expelleys aquel a las partidas defora ves le loc del qual vos la seccio.	And then press on that with your finger and expel it through the lower opening by means of the place where you cauterized.
E comanda al ministra que prema la vesica am la sua ma; e comanda a un autra ministra que am la sua ma dextra extenda les genetius a las partidas desus, e am la sua autra ma remaugua la codena la qual es dejos les genetius, en partida del loc en le qual se fa la seccio.	And order the assistant to press on the bladder with his hand; and order another assistant that with his right hand to extend the scrotum upwards, and with his other hand to massage the cord which is below the scrotum in the place where you are cauterizing.
E aprop entromet espatum be inscident del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And then insert a piece of sponge in the passage, the shape of which is as follows:
e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; e sia la seccio sobre aquela peyra e·l tieu dit sia en le cul, e sia fayta seccio transversa, per que la seccio defora sia ampla e dedintz streyta segon la quantitat que egrecio de la peyra sia a lu possibla, e no major, quar fort leu comprem le tieu dit le qual es en le cul la peyra deves la seccio, e es foro-getada ses defacultat.	and cut through it where it is between the anus and scrotum, not in the middle part, but on the left side of the scrotum; and let the cauterization be over that stone, and let your finger be in the anus, and let the incision be transverse so that the opening outwards may be wide and the opening inwards narrow according to the amount of stone which can be expelled without difficulty, and not larger, for fear it should close up again.
E sapias que de la peyra es alcuna a la qual so angle e margers, per que le eyssiment de lu es fayt deficil per aquo.	And take note that some stone has corners and edges, in consequence of which the expulsion is made difficult thereby.
E de aquela aquo es leon semblant a glan, e es redonda, e es fayt de lu leugier eyssiment.	And some are like a onion, round and easy to expel.
Donc si es aquela al qual so angles e marger, ajusta en la fissura.	Therefore if it is one of those which have corners and edges, adjust the cautery in the fissure.
E si no es ayssi foro-getada, lahoras cove que tu engenes sobre aquel, o que strenguas sobre aquel am gesti decentment, la extremitat del qual sia ayssi cum lima am le qual strenguas sobre la peyra, e no evasesca de lu; o que entrometas dejos lu instrument subtil de curvada extremitat.	And if it is not expelled, then let you press on that, or that you press upon it gently with a suitable instrument, the end of which is curved, and do not allow it to slip out; or insert below it a thin instrument with a curved end.
Mays si tu no podes sobre aquel, lahoras tu amplifica le trauc un petit, e si tu veus flux de sanc, abscindeys en strenh aquel am vitriol trissat.	But if you cannot reach it, then let you enlarge the hole a little, and if you see any bleeding, bind up that tightly with powdered vitriol.
Mays si la peyra es mays de una, lahoras al comensament tu impelleys la ma a la boca de la vesica, e aprop inscideys sobre lu; e aprop impelleys un petit aprop aquo; e semblantment fay si son motas mays de doas.	But if it is larger than one, then at the beginning push your finger towards the mouth of the bladder, and then insert a small instrument into it; and act in the same way if there are more than two.
E si es peyra mot gran, lahoras ignorancia es que tu inscidas aquel am gran seccio, quar accideys al malaute una de doas causas: o que mora o que endevengua a lu destillacio de urina continuabla, per aquo quar le loc no es de tot consolidat.	And if the stone is very large, then it is foolishness to insert it with a wide incision, for two causes may occur: either it will stay there or it will cause continuous discharge of urine, because the passage has not healed completely.
Mays aministra expulcio de lu entro que sia fora-getada, o engenia en la fractura de lu am las forfexs entro que extragua aquela en pessas.	But let the assistant expel it once it is pushed out, or force it in the fracture with pincers in order to extract that into pieces.
Donc cum tu auras cumplit la tua opperacio, lahoras omple la plagua de enses de aloe e de sanc de drago, e strenh aquel.	Therefore when you have finished your operation, then fill the wound with cotton wool soaked in aloe and dragon's blood, and bind it up tightly.
E pausa sobre aquel drap enfus en oli e vi, o en oli rozat e aygua frega, per so que apostema caut sia cedat.	And place over that a cloth which has been dipped in oil and wine, or in rose oil and water, in order that the wound may heal quickly.
E aprop resupina le malaute sobre le sieu col, e no deslias le liament entro al tertz dia.	And then bind up the patient over his navel, and do not loosen the bandage for three days.
E cum aquel auras desliat, embroca le loc am aygua e mot oli, e aprop cura aquel am enguent diafinicon e am enguent diabazilicon entro que sia sanat.	And when you have loosened it, wash the wound with water and oil, and then cure that with ointment of diaphenicon and ointment of diabasilicon until it is healed.
Mays si en la plagua accideys apostema caut, adhust e corrosiu, e de aquel semblantz ayssi cum si le sanc es en la vesica congelat, e per lu es la hurina prohibida (e aquo es conogut per la egressio del sanc am urina), a donc entromet lo tieu dit en la plagua e extratz aquel sanc, quar si roman provoca la vesica a corropcio de la vesica e de lu putrefaccio.	But if in the wound there occurs an abscess, hard and ulcerous, and this is like a congelation of the blood in the bladder so that passage of urine is prevented  (and this is called by some the exit of blood through the urethra), then let you insert your finger into the wound and extract that blood, for if it becomes putrid and rotten it will provoke corruption of the bladder.
E aprop lava la plagua am vi agre, aygua e sal, e am opposicio a tota specia, am aquo que conveneys a lu de la curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then wash the wound with sweet wine, water and salt, and apply all remedies which seem suitable for its cure until it is healed.
E cove en las horas de tota la curacio que tu lies amdos las coyssas e ajustes las medicinas las quals so pausadas sobre le loc.	And throughout the whole of the cure let you press both scrota and apply remedies which are laid on the wound.
E si la peyra es petita e es en le meat de la vergua, e es ficat en lu, e eyssement de urina es prohibit, lahoras cura aquel am aquo que yeu recomti denant que pervenguas a seccio, quar tropas veguadas per aquesta curacio yest acusat de seccio; e ja yeu e esproat aquo, e es que tu prenguas un perforador de ferr alfelut, del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if the stone is small and lodged in the middle of the urethra so that passage of urine is prohibited, then cure it by cauterizing there, for troops have often been seen to be cured by this cure; and I have also tried it, and it has been found effective, and you should use a piercing instrument of iron, the shape of which is as follows:
de triangulada extramitat, agut, ficat en fust.	triangular in cross-section, pointed, set in a handle.
E aprop pren fiel, e lia am aquel la vergua dejos la peyra per so que no retorne a la vesica.	And then take a hammer and hit the urethra below the stone so that it does not return to the bladder.
E aprop entromet le ferr en la vergua, perforant am fecilitat entro que·l perforador vengua ad aquela peyra.	And then insert the iron into the urethra, piercing with ease so that the piercing instrument reaches that stone.
E revolveys le perforador am la tua ma en aquela peyra petit a petit, e tu perforsa la perforacio de lu entro que fassas aquel del autra part penetrar; quar la urina tantost es absolta.	And turn the piercing instrument with your hand on that small stone little by little, and pierce through it so that you make the passage on the other side as well, for urine is immediately expelled.
E aprop prem la tua ma sobre aquo que es romas de la peyra de la partida deforo de la vergua, quar aquela es trinquada, e es foro-getada am la urina, e le malaute es sanat.	And then press your hand over that which is broken from the stone in the passage of the urethra, for it is clenched and the passage is closed by the urine, and the patient is cured.
Mays si aquesta curacio no es a tu aparelhada per alcuna causa la qual prohibeys de aquela, lahoras lia un fiel dejos la peyra, e autra fiel desus la peyra.	But if this cure is not equipped for some cause which prevents it, then strike a hammer below the stone and another hammer above it.
E aprop encideys sobre la peyra en aquela vergua entre doas liaduras.	And then close upon that stone in the urethra between two ligatures.
E aprop extratz aquela.	And then you extract it.
E aprop deslia le liament e mondifica le sanc congilat, le qual es fayt en la plagua.	Then cut the ligament and clean the clotted blood that has accumulated in the wound.
E no es necessari liament de fiel dejos la peyra, sino per que no retorne a la vesica, e l’autre liament desus sino, quar quan es desliat le fiel aprop la egrecio de la peyra, la codena retorna a son loc e cobra la plagua.	And it is not necessary to cut the ligament of the gallbladder below the stone, but so that it does not return to the bladder; and the other ligament above, for when the gallbladder is removed and the stone comes out, the bladder returns to its place and the wound heals.
E per aquo es a tu necessari quan lias le fiel desus, que tu eleves la codena a las partidas desus, o que retorne deves le tieu compliment, e cobra la plagua ayssi co havem dit.	And for this reason, when you tie the gallbladder above, you must lift the bladder up to the opening above, or it will return to its original position and the wound will not heal as we have said.
Capitol .lxi.	Chapter 61:
De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	On the extraction of stones from women.
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	Stones are rarely formed in women.
Mays si ve peyra ad alcuna de aquelas, lahoras dificil es la curacio de lu, e es prohibida per tropas manieyras.	However, if a stone is found in one of them, then its cure is difficult and prohibited by many methods.
La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.	One of these is that the woman is very young.
E la segonda es quar tu no trobas femna be scient que descroba si meteyssa al metge quan es casta, o es de las femnas haventz maritz.	And the second is that you do not find a woman who is willing to reveal if she has had sexual intercourse or is married.
La tersa es quar tu no hatrobas femna be sabent aquesta art, majorment la operacio am ma.	The third is that you cannot find a woman skilled in this art, especially one who performs the operation with her hands.
E la quarta es que·l loc de la seccio sobre peyra en las femnas es longinc del loc de la peyra, per que indigeys de seccio preonda, e en aquela es temor.	And the fourth is that the site of incision for removing a stone in women is distant from the location of the stone; therefore, it requires a long incision, and there is fear in that.
Mays si necessitat provoca a tu ad aquo, lahoras cove que tu prenguas una femna metga be scient, e pauc es atrobada.	However, if necessity compels you to do this, then know that you must take a female doctor who is very skilled, and she is rarely found.
Mays si tu es privat de aquela, lahoras cerca metga quast e subtil, o presenta una femna matrona be esenhada en le feyt de las femnas, o femna que en aquesta art ennueys partida del art.	But if you lack such a woman, then seek a subtle and skilled male doctor, or present a female midwife who is experienced in the affairs of women, or a woman who has some knowledge of this art.
Donc fay aquela present, e comanda a lu que fassa tot aquo que tu li mandaras, de la enquisicio sobre la peyra al comensament; la qual causa es que reguarde si la femna es verges, lahoras cove que meta lo sieu dit en le cul de lu e quiera la peyra.	Then have her present and command him to do everything that you tell him, from the examination for the stone to the beginning; the purpose of this is to determine whether the woman is a virgin, then have her insert her finger into the anus and feel for the stone.
Donc si atroba aquela, coarte aquela dejos le sieu dit, e lahoras comanda a lu que inscida sobre aquela.	Then if she finds it, hold it back with her finger, and then command him to insert his hand into her.
Mays si no es verge, lahoras comanda a la matrona que entrometa lo sieu dit en le conh de la malauta e enquiera sobre la peyra, pus que pausa la sua ma sinistra sobre la vesica, e comprem aquela am bona comprecio.	But if she is not a virgin, then command the midwife to insert her finger into the vagina and feel for the stone; then have her pause her left hand over the bladder and press it firmly with good grip.
Donc si atroba aquela, lahoras cove que gradantment maugua aquela de l’orrifici de la vesica a las partidas dejos am somman de la sua vertut entro que pervengua am aquel a la razit de la coyssa.	Then if she finds it, then have her gradually push the stone from the opening of the bladder to the parts below until it comes out at the root of the thigh.
E aprop inscida sobre aquela apposicio de la maytat del conh deves la razit de la coyssa de qualque part sia a lu parada e cent la peyra en aquela partida, e·l dit de lu no sia remaugut de la peyra coartan dejos lu.	Then insert your finger into the vagina above the root of the thigh from whichever side it is found, and center the stone in that part, and his finger should not be pushed back by the stone as he holds it.
E la seccio sia pauca al comensament; e aprop entrometa lo ray sobre aquela seccio, e si sent la peyra, lahoras ajuste en seccio segon la quantitat la qual sap que la peyra sira getada de aquela.	And the incision should be small at first; then insert your finger into that incision and if he feels the stone, then widen the incision according to the size of the stone he knows will come out.
E sapias que las specias de peyra son motas: quar de aquelas es pauca e gran, e leon e aspra, e longua e redonda, e havent ramps.	And know that there are many kinds of stones: some are small and large, smooth and rough, long and round, and they have projections.
Donc tu sapias quantas specias so de lu per aquo que tu signifiques sobre aquo que vols.	Therefore you should know how many types there are so that you can indicate what you want.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, ajusta en le loc vetriol trissat e te aquela per una hora entro que sia abscindit le sanc, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	And if you see bleeding, apply crushed vitriol to the wound and hold it there for an hour until the bleeding stops; then return to your operation and finish removing the stone.
E fay que prepares am tu dels instrumentz les quals e ditz en la extraccio de peyra en les homes, per so que sias ajudat per aquels en la tua operacio.	And prepare the instruments which you use in extracting stones from men, so that you may be assisted by them in your operation.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, e sabes que la expulcio del sanc es de la arceria que es insciza, lahoras tu pausa polvera sobre le loc e estrenh aquel am pulvils e strictura descent, e no iteras aquo; e layssa la peyra e no extraguas aquela, quar fort leu morira la malauta.	And if you see bleeding and know that the flow of blood is from an artery that has been cut, then you must pause powder over the wound and bind it tightly with a bandage; do not repeat this; remove the stone and do not extract it, for the patient will surely die.
E aprop cura la plagua.	Then heal the wound.
Donc cum es cedada la acuitat del sanc aprop alcus jorns, e·l loc se poyreys, lahoras tu retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	So when the sharpness of the bleeding has ceased and the wound is closed, then return to your operation and finish removing the stone.
Capitol lxii.	Chapter 62:
De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	On incision for hernia in women.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	Hernia is nothing but an accumulation of moisture in the white membrane below the diaphragm that contains the bowels; it is named ciphax.
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	And in some cases it is in the lower part of the peritoneum that nature prepares it in the part of the bowels where there are other bowels; and it is the diaphragm below the white membrane that we have said earlier, and it is not anything else but hernia.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	And the generation of this hernia is due to weakness that occurs in the bowels, because this matter flows into them; and sometimes it occurs due to a blow made on the bowels.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	And this moisture has many colors; for the color of it is either inclining towards yellowish or blood-red, or red, or is dark and foul, or it is watery white, and that is what is most common.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part.	And the signs by which one knows that this accumulation of moisture is in the white diaphragm that we have said earlier are: for if it is in the white diaphragm, then the hernia is round and declining a little towards length with the figure of the bowels, and covering the bowel; for the moisture contains all around.
E si la humiditat es en le propri pannicol, lahoras le apostema es redon am partida del huou e per aysso hom estima que es autre huou.	And if the moisture is in the peritoneum itself, then the hernia is round with the part of the bowels and one estimates that it is another bowel.
E si la humiditat es entre la codena dels genetius e·l ciphac blanc, lahoras catz dejos le centiment.	And if the moisture is between the diaphragm of the bowels and the white diaphragm, then cut below the center.
E cum tu vols la cognicio de la color de la humiditat, lahoras tu esproa la color de la humiditat en le apostema am entromes cayrat del qual la forma es precedida; e segon aquo que es eyssit en le vestigi del entromes, jutga de aquo que es dedintz lu.	And when you want to know the color of the moisture, then test the color of the moisture in the hernia with a needle from which the thread has been removed; and according to what is seen in the marks of the needle, judge what is inside it.
Donc quan nos vinem a la curacio de lu am ferr, lahoras cove que comandem al malaute que sia fleubotomat si aquo es a tu possibla, e vezes le cos de lu ple.	Therefore when we come to the treatment of it with iron, then have the patient lie on his back if that is possible for him, and see his chest.
E aprop sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos sobre alcuna causa un pauc auta, e pausa dejos lu motz draps.	Then let him be reclined on his back for some reason a little higher, and place underneath him several folded sheets.
E aprop setz tu sobre la part sinistra de lu, e comanda al ministra que segua a la dextra de lu, le qual extenda la sua vergua a hun de dos latz a la codena dels genetius e a la partida del mirac del ventre.	Then stand to the left of him, and command the assistant to stand to the right of him, who should extend his arm to one side of the bowels and to the top of the navel.
E aprop pren spatum lat e scindeys la codena dels genetius del mieg loc per la longitut entro prop le pentenilh.	Then take a pointed instrument and cut the diaphragm of the bowels in the middle part, cutting it along its length through the pentangular.
E sia fayta la seccio segon rectetut engualment distant de la linha que deveseys la pel dels genetius, entro que pervengua al ciphac blanc comprehendent.	And let the incision be made according to the straightness equally distant from the line that must be observed between the skin of the bowels, so that it reaches the white diaphragm.
E excorja aquel, e observa, e guarda te per aysso que tu no inscidas aquel; e la tua excoriacio am la qual aquel excorjas per partida jassia que sia suspenduda am le huou mays e subtilment escruta am la excoriacio segon la quantitat a tu possibla.	Excorate it, and observe, and be careful so that you do not insert anything into it; and your excising with which you exciate it according to the part that is suspended by the bowels, examine closely by excising according to the amount that is possible for you.
E aprop perfora le ciphac ple de aygua am perforacio ampla, e extratz tota l’aygua.	Then pierce the lower diaphragm with a wide incision, and extract all the moisture.
E aprop separa entre doas labias de la seccio am uncis, e exten le ciphac a las partidas desus; e no toques la codena les genetius comprehendent, e inscideys le ciphac en aquela manieyra que es a tu possible.	Then separate between the two lips of the incision with hooks, and stretch the diaphragm above them; and do not touch the bowels contained, and insert the diaphragm in that way that is possible for you.
E inscideys aquel am la sua totalitat o en pessas, e majorment le sieu latz subtil, quar si tu no perscrutas exquisidament la inscizio de lu, no es fayta segurtat que la aygua no retorne.	Then insert it completely or in pieces, and especially with its sides very fine; for if you do not examine the incision of it thoroughly, there is no security that the moisture will not return.
Mays si le huou procezeys de aquela defora de la sua codena en la ora de la tua operacio, lahoras quan tu auras complida la seccio del ciphac, retorna dedintz aquel, e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la codena dels genetius am sutura, e aprop cura aquel ayssi cum las autras plagua, entro que sia sanat.	But if you notice that it has protruded beyond the edge of its sheath during your operation, then when you have finished cutting the scrotum, return it inside and sew up the two lips of the scrotum of the testicles with a suture, and treat it as you would any other wound until it is healed.
E si atrobas le huou corromput per autra malautia, lahoras cove que tu lies les vayssels les quals so sore le suspensori, e extrat le huou, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit.	And if you find the testicle corrupted by some other disease, then cut the vessels which are above the suspensory ligament, extract the testicle and treat it as we have said.
Mays si l’aygua es agreguada en doas partidas esemps, lahoras sapias que doas son las ernias; donc inscideys aquela partida segon que has feyt en l’autra engualment; e si es a tu vist que sia una opera, lahoras tu la fay.	But if the hernia is divided into two parts, then know that there are two hernias; therefore incise that part according as you have done in the other, and if it appears to you to be one operation, then perform it.
E aprop tu abstergiys le sanc, e entramet en las seccios lana submersa en oli o en oli rozat; e pausa deforo autra lana la qual tu as submersa en vi e oli, e expandeys aquela sobre dos genetius e·l mirac del ventre; e pausa desobre draps doblatz e pulvils, e lia aquels desobre am liament le qual es segon aquesta forma:	And you should clean the blood and insert into the incisions wool which is soaked in oil or rose oil; and place outside another piece of wool which is soaked in wine and oil, and spread this over both testicles and the abdomen; and place over it folded sheets and powdery lint, and tie those over with a ligature which is according to this form:
e aprop sian preses dos draps e sian humplitz de lana carmenada segon aquesta semblansa; e sian faytas las extremitatz am les quals es premut de coto o de lana humida, e sian agreguatz am strectura en le braguier de las braguas, e la una de las extremitatz prengua del cul entro al dos, e la segonda prengua a la partida del pantenilh, e dos extramitatz sobre dos coyssas dejos e dos extramitatz autras sobre dos angonars, e tota extrictura sia ajustada en le braguier de las braguas.	and two sheets should be pressed and filled with wool dyed red according to this shape; and the extremities with which it is tied up should be made of gut or of wet wool, and they should be attached by a string to the waistband of the trousers, and one extremity should go from behind between the buttocks and the second should go to the front part of the scrotum, and two extremities on each thigh and two other extremities on both sides of the groin, and all of the string should be tightened at the waistband of the trousers.
E alcunas veguadas aquesta hernia es medicada artificialment am cauteri en loc de seccio am ferr; e es que tu prenguas cauteri cutellar subtil e que inscidas am aquel la codena dels ginitius, e es ignit segon que havem recomtat entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc contenent la aygua, e lahoras tu pren cauteri segon aquesta forma:	And sometimes this hernia is treated artificially by cautery instead of cutting with an iron; and you should take a thin scalpel and cut the scrotum of the testicles, and ignite it according to what we have recommended until the white sac containing the testicle is uncovered, and then you should apply cautery according to this form:
e es asemblat a letra greca.	and it is similar to the Greek letter alpha.
E aprop perfora am aquel ciphac, e es ignit entro que tota la humiditat sia fora-gitada.	And you should pierce with that scalpel and ignite it until all of the moisture has been driven out.
E aprop exten le ciphac am uncis, e excorja am uncis, e excorja am cauteri subtil ignit; e inscideys aquel segon que es a tu possible entro que eradiques tot lu; e guarda te del huou que·l foc no·l toque.	And you should extend the scrotum with tongs and scrape it with tongs, and scrape with a small cautery which is ignited; and incise it according as it is possible for you to do so until you have eradicated all of it; and beware that the fire does not touch the testicle.
E sapias que aquesta operacio es pus salva e pus longinqua de flux de sanc, e milhor que operacio am seccio.	And know that this operation is more safe and more distant from blood flow, and better than an operation with cutting.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat apostema caut en la hora de seccio o en hora de cauteri, o flux de sanc, lahoras cove que tu cures qual contrarietat fa a tu per aquo, am curacio la qual conveneys a lu segon que es dit.	But if you experience an ulcer during cutting or cautery, or blood flow, then know that you should treat the ulcer according to what it requires with treatment which is suitable for it according to what has been said.
Mays si le malaute es pauruc, e no spera la segonda operacio per la sua horribilitat, lahoras administra perforacio segon que yeu recomti aquo; e es quan es certificat deves tu, per aquo que havem dit de las significacios, que aquela hernia es ayguosa.	But if the patient is cowardly and does not expect a second operation because of its horrible nature, then you should perform piercing according to what I have recommended when it has been certified by you, through what has been said about the signs, that the hernia is fluid.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute sobre alcuna cezelha elevada, aprop perfora le apostema en la partida pus bassa de lu am spatum lat, e pausa la perforacio segon la longitut del cos.	Then you should have the patient lie on his back on a high bed, and pierce the ulcer in the lowest part of it with a broad spear, and make the piercing according to the length of the body.
E sia la apercio ampla entro que corro tota l‘aygua.	And the aperture should be ample so that all of the fluid runs out.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc coto e lia aquel e layssa aquel, per so que corro le romanent de l’aygua.	And you should place gut and ligature over it and leave it there so that the rest of the fluid runs out.
E aprop cura aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	And you should treat it until the wound is healed.
Mays si contrarietat es a la egrecio de l’aygua en aquela hora tu perforas aquela: e aquo no es fayt sino per aquo quar le pannicol blanc en le orrifici de la plagua fa contrarietat e prohibeys le eyssiment de l’aygua, lahoras cove que tu metas en la plagua pena o instrument am la qual es extrayta l’aygua dels ydropitz, la forma del qual es precedida; o ajusta en la opprecio de la plagua un petit.	But if there is resistance to the discharge of the fluid when you pierce it: and this does not occur unless the white membrane in the orifice of the wound causes resistance and prohibits the exit of the fluid, then you should insert into the wound a peg or instrument by which the fluid is extracted from the hydrocele, the shape of which has been described; or attach to the compression of the hydrocele a small.
E sapias que l’aygua retorna, e es agueguada aprop vi meses o enaviro aquels; e cum es agreguada, lahoras sia perforat segon aquela meteyssa manieyra, quar le malaute ayssi passara les sieus dias.	And know that the fluid returns and is accumulated again after about a month or so; and when it has been accumulated, then it should be pierced according to that same manner, for the patient will pass his days like this.
Capitol .lxiii.	Chapter 63.
De seccio sobre hernia carnosa e la curacio de lu.	On cutting on a fleshy hernia and its treatment.
Sapias que en la seccio sobre aquesta hernia es temor perdusent a pernicia en las majors disposicios; per que a mi es vista la dimissio de lu e esser salvat per aquela milhor.	Know that in cutting on this hernia there is great fear of death in the greater dispositions; for I have seen the discharge of it and the patient saved by it.
E yeu so rememorant la operacio en aquela e las specias dels apostemas.	And I am remembering the operation on that one and the properties of ulcers.
Donc, dic que l‘apostemas natz en les cos dels quals les genetius so conponutz e es fayt aquo per motas causas: o per superfluitat aguda agra, la qual es efundida als genetius, o per percuscio.	Therefore, I say that ulcers arise in the bodies of which the testicles are composed and are caused by many causes: or by acute sharp superfluity, which is distributed to the testicles, or by impact.
E es la color de la apostema segon la color del cos, e no es atrobat en lu dolor, e es apostema greu.	And the color of the ulcer is according to the color of the body, and there is not pain in it, and it is a heavy ulcer.
E fort leu es apostema lapificada, del qual la color es fosca, e no es centiment a lu.	And its surface is smooth, of which the color is dark, and there is no feeling to it.
E alcunas veguadas es fayt per nodacio de las arcerias, e per imflacio de aquelas ayssi quo ja es perceubut la rememoracio de lu, o per imflacio de venas.	And sometimes it is caused by constriction of the vessels, and by inflammation of those thus, as has been perceived by memory of it, or by inflammation of veins.
Mays aquo que es per imflacio de arcerias es conogut per la dispercio de la apostema quan compremas aquela am les tieus ditz; e no cove que aquel toques.	But that which is caused by inflammation of vessels is known by the distribution of the ulcer when you compress it with your fingers; and there should not be touch to it.
Mays aquel que es fayt per imflacio de vena no es dispergut de lu alcuna causa deves la compressio am les ditz.	But that which is caused by inflammation of a vein is not distributed from it because of compression with the fingers.
E ja es possible que sobre aquesta specia sia fayta seccio e sobre les autres carns; e es que tu inscida la codena dels genetius, e aprop esten le huou a las partidas desus, e extratz aquel del ciphac blanc, e deliura le suspensori dels vaysels, e ligua les, e inscideys le suspensori pus que tu deliuras aquel de tota partida de las partidas del huou.	And it is possible that on this kind there should be cutting and on the other meats; and you should cut the scrotum of the testicles, and then extend the testicle to the parts above it, and extract it from the white sac, and ligate the suspensory ligament of the vessels, and incise the suspensory more so that you can extract it from all parts of the testicle.
Donc si l’huou ja es am aquelas carnadas consolida, lahoras cove que tu extraguas le huou e inscidas aquel.	Therefore if the hydrocele has become consolidated with those meats, then you should extract the hydrocele and incise it.
E si es adherencia entro alcuna causa del ciphac, o entre aquo que es entre les bayssels, lahoras cove que tu deliures tota aquela adherencia e inscidas aquela per inscizio redonda.	And if there is adhesions for some cause from the scrotum, or between that which is between the vessels, then you should loosen all of that adhesion and incise it with a round incision.
Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.	But if there is generation of flesh in the place of the adhesions which are behind, then you should incise all that is of it and extract the hydrocele as we have said.
Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Therefore when your operation is completed, then fill the wound with wool soaked in rose oil and wine; and you should treat it with the other treatment until it is healed.
Capitol .lxiv.	Chapter 64.
De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	On the treatment of a hernia which is of veins.
Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.	Vein is an ulcer wrapped by some wrapper like a bud with softening of the testicles, and it makes difficult movement exercise and walking on the patient.
E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.	And in the treatment of this disease there is fear because of that by which memory precedes it.
Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.	However, you should apply treatment to it according to what they did at first.
E dic que cove que fassas sezer le malaute sobre una cezelha elevada; e aprop enpelleys le suspensori dels testiculs a las partidas dejos; e aprop te la codena dels genetius am les tieus ditz am les baysels que so probdas a la vergua; e tengua aquels autre ministre que tu, e extenda aquels am extencio vehement.	And I say that you should have the patient lie on his back on a high bed, and compress the suspensory ligament of the testicles at the parts below; and then you should touch the scrotum of the testicles with your fingers at the vessels which have been proven to the staff, and extend those with violent extension.
E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.	And you should incise with a broad spear piercing across the right of the vessels so that the vessels are uncovered.
E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.	Then you will cut away any extra skin as we have said in the extraction of an arrow, which is found in the temples.
E aprop fica en aquelas un’agulha en la qual sia fiel doble, e lia aquel en le primier del locs en les quals accideys vit, e lia aquel autra veguada en le derier de lor.	Then you will put an needle in those spots, with one thread doubled over it, and tie the first one in the place where the wound occurred, and the other one at the back of the wound.
E aprop inscideys aquels en le mieg loc per seccio dreyta segon la longuesa del cos, e extratz aquo que es agreguat de las humiditatz fetulentas e corruptas.	Then you will cut them in the middle according to the length of the body, and extract what is aggregated from the putrid and corrupt humidity.
E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	Then you will cure the ulcer with a cure for other ulcers where you want pus to be generated so that the vessels which have become black from one of two things, for it is not harmful by that.
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	But if the wound occurs in all the passages, then you must extract the testicles or that the testicles by that are withdrawn from the vessels, so that it is deprived of all nourishment by the incision of the vessels, and that they are atrophied, or that it is useless by that.
Capitol .lxv.	Chapter 65:
De la cura de hernia entestinal.	On the treatment of intestinal hernias.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The occurrence of this hernia is due to an opening that extends in the chest towards the abdomen from the angles of the navel, so that when the intestines are pushed through that rupture into any of the intestines.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	And this rupture is either from the chest or from an opening in it, and these two species occur for various reasons: by percussion, or by blows, or by crying, or by the elevation of some heavy cause, or by similarities.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	And the sign of this, when it is from the extension of the chest, is that it occurs gradually over a long time, and does not occur suddenly, and it is a suppurative ulcer inside the abdomen because the chest compresses the intestine.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	And the sign of it is when it is from an opening in the chest; because at the beginning it causes violent pain suddenly; and it is a diverse ulcer apparent below the apparent armpit, and this is due to the displacement of the intestine, and its body towards the parts outside the chest.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And sometimes it is pushed out with the intestine, and this hernia is called intestinal hernia.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And sometimes it is made with a hernia sac, and sometimes a hole in the intestine, and here it is retained, and this causes great harm to the patient, and sometimes it causes bad pain and especially when it is pressed.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in the treatment of these species of this illness with iron there is fear, because one must avoid the formation in it.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	And the way of performing this operation is to command the patient to draw in the intestine with his hand towards its cavity if he obeys its return, and then let him lie on his side between your hands, and lift his legs.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	And then you will bring the armpit which connects with the armpit of the testicles upwards, and you will open the armpit entirely throughout its length; and you will put nails in two lips of the opening according to what you command them to open it with.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if the opening according to the quantity that is possible for you, that from that the sac is pushed out.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	And then you will cut away those chest muscles which are under the armpit of the testicles, until the white hard chest muscle is uncovered in each part.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Then you will put your finger into that which connects the testicle, in that which is between the white chest and the second chest, and you will free with it the adhesion which is in the part behind the sac.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	And then you will draw with your hand the armpit of the testicles upwards, and you will extend the white chest towards it with your left hand, and lift the sac with the chest to the opening of the incision; and you will command the assistant to extend the sac towards you, and you will dissolve the adhesion behind it with a completed solution.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	And you must pay attention with your fingers that there is no cause for the intestine to be wrapped in the white hard chest.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	But if you find any cause for it, then you will push it back down into the abdomen.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	And then you will take a needle in which is made a thick thread of six threads, and you will put that through the back of the chest, which is under the armpit of the testicles, which connects the incision; and you will insert the ends which emerge from the thread so that there are four threads, and then you will tie some of them into any shape like a hook; and you will tie with it the chest of which we have said that is under the armpit of the testicles with a strong ligature in two parts.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And then you will wrap the ends of the threads and tie those with a violent ligature so that none of the vessels which have become black can transmit any cause so that apostemes do not occur here.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And you will pause another ligature after the first ligature, long enough to be three fingers; and then these two ligatures will separate from the chest which is under the armpit of the testicles by the amount of the size of a finger, and you will insert all the rest according to roundness, and push out the sac from it.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And then you will insert in the part under the armpit of the testicles by an incision from which blood and pus flow as we have mentioned in what we have said.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	And then you will administer wool soaked in oil, and pause it over the ulcer; and administer the ligature which we have recommended (and sometimes the white chest is cauterized, which we have said about the incision of it fears a flow of blood, because many times they occur there), and let the ligature fall so that by itself it will close.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	But if its closing is delayed, then have water heated, and pause it over that so that it falls according to what we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And then cure the ulcer with the other cure of ulcers where it is healthy.
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter 66:
De hernia ventosa.	On hernia sac.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this hernia, there is no one who has been cured with the treatment of it with iron.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	And the first thing that is done as we have recommended in the hernia which is with a sac; and then you will tie the intestines over that incision with ease of it; and then dry in the middle around the ulcer with that which causes that, from which the intestines fall out.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	And cure the ulcer as we have said so that it is healthy.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter 67:
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	On the rupture which is made in the angles.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Sometimes there is a rupture in the angles as we have said, and it emerges from the place.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And do not allow any cause of the intestines to the genitals; and if it occurs, that is rare; and return it in all hours.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	But if the time is prolonged with that, it is a fracture in the chest from which the intestine emerges in the chest; and this occurs because of the extension of the chest which is in the angles as we have said, which cause is because the chest is extended, and then it becomes soft and the place is suppurative and emerges.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And its cure is with cautery as it is preceded by the narratio of it.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And sometimes it is cured with iron in this way: and the patient hangs over his chest between your hands, and then drys the place of the rupture of the suppuratives emerging from incision according to the length of three fingers.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And then tightly tie the white bandage that is under the cord until it is exposed.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	And then take the thread and place it over the prominent part of the wound, and press it to the abdomen.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And then sew the two prominent ends of the wound with the thread, joining one end to the other.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	And then pull the end of the thread, but do not cut the bandage at all, nor stretch it out, nor any other cause that you know about in the treatment of intestinal hernias.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	And then treat that with the treatment of ulcers, and when you insert the gallbladder, cleanse it and restore the ulcer until it is consolidated; for the bandage is contracted and the prominence of the rupture is not tightened.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cautery is better in this place, because it is closer to health.
Capitol .lxviii.	Chapter 68:
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	On the softening of the cords of the testes.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	Many times the cords of the testes in some men are softened because the flesh that is between them is softened, and the guarding of it is weakened.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	Therefore, it is necessary for the person treating the patient to make him lie on his back, and insert all of the softened cord along the natural cord; and then sew two lips with thread.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you want, sew up the superfluity of the softened cord in three or four places and with a firm stitch.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	And then insert between the stitches; and then treat by the treatment of other ulcers until it is healed and the gallbladders fall out.
Capitol .lxix.	Chapter 69:
De castracio.	On castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	Know that castration in our law is excommunicated, but for two reasons it has been related to me in this book: the first is so that the doctor who is questioned about it knows its treatment, and the second reason is that many times we have needed to castrate other beasts for our own purposes, like horses, oxen, pigs, and similar animals.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And so I say that castration is done in two ways: either by crushing or by cutting through.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	But in the method that is done by crushing, the procedure is to make the beast defecate in warm water until its testicles are softened and hang down.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	And then grab those with your hand until they are dissolved and do not appear below the touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	But in castration done by cutting and sectioning, you must hold the beast and squeeze the cord of its testicles with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	And then cut through the suspensory ligament and insert between each pair of processes with one cut until there are two holes.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	And then insert those more that you have cut off.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	And do not leave any cause on the bandage over them, but only the thin bandage which is over the veins.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	And this method of castration is better which is done by crushing, because crushing strongly leaves no cause in the testicles so that the beast desires copulation.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	And then treat the ulcer until it is healed.
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter 70:
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	On the treatment of hermaphrodites.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphrodites in men are of two kinds: the first is when there appears an orifice between the cords of the testes, where there is a figure like that of a woman’s vulva between the two testicles.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And sometimes from it urine flows from the cord of the testicles.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	But in women there is only one type: and it is that the clitoris on the foreskin is like two testicles of a man, a little of everything at the beginning of the foreskin like the foreskin of a man and two testicles.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	And the treatment is of three kinds: two from men and one from women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	And it is that you insert those tight flesh until the impression of that flows out, and then treat those with the treatment of other ulcers.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	And in the second kind of men from whom urine flows from the cord of the testicles, there is no treatment or operation for it.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter 71:
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	On the hymen and prominent flesh due to causes in women.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	The strong hymen is tightly attached to natural causes so that it is pressed and made thin the guarding; and in some women it is enlarged so much that it is stretched like men and can enter into intercourse.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Therefore, you must grab the superfluity of the hymen with your hand or with a needle and insert it.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	And do not pierce in the incision, especially in the part of the vein, so that no blood flow ensues.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	And then treat that with the treatment of ulcers until it is healed.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	But born flesh is flesh that grows in the womb of the mother to fill it, and very often it grows out from the foreskin according to the appearance of a snake (and because of this some call this “tail-like hermaphrodite”); therefore we must insert it like an hymen and treat it until it is healed.
Capitol .lxxii.	Chapter 72:
De curacio de alratica.	On the treatment of syphilis.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	Syphilis is when the clitoris of a woman is not perforated, or it is a small wound.
E es o natural o accidental.	And it can be natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	Accidental is due to a wound that has preceded it, and that is caused by tightly bound flesh or a thin bandage or membrane.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	And it is caused either in the womb or the bones of it, or in the supine part of it, or in the lower part of it, and strongly prohibits copulation and pregnancy, and very often the menstruation.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	And the diagnosis of it is made by the guarding of the midwife, if the oppression is evident, then you must cover it with bandages; but if it is not evident, then you should draw it with your fingers or with a thread.
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	But if the oppression is due to a thin bandage and is prominent between the two lips, then you must cut and rupture it.
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	And so that it rests on both lips, and then rest your fingers from both sides and press them inwards.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	And let the woman be on her back with her legs extended, and then extend both lips with force so that the thin bandage is broken and the oppression opened.
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	And then take wool and dip it in oil and place it over the wound, and anoint it with ointment every day until the wound is healed.
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	But if the bandage is thick and tough, then you must insert it with liniment of lat or myrrh resin.
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	But if the oppression is due to bound flesh, then suspend that with a thread and insert it.
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	Let them be the medicines that cause bleeding to stop, like aconite, and dragon’s blood, and alder, bound with egg white.
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	And then administer a wide lead cane for so that the wound is not healed loosely.
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	And hold it for several days and give it cool water of lye.
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	And then let it be healed by the other treatment of consolidation until it is healed.
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	And sometimes accidents happen in the great conception of other meats, and then they are conceived according to this manner.
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	But if it is by the ulcer of the bone, then do not do any opposition to the ulcer of the bone in any way.
Capitol .lxxiii.	Chapter 73.
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	Of the cure of hemorrhoids, and of tail and red buttock which happen in the vagina of women.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	Hemorrhoids are an obstruction of the orifices of many veins from which much blood flows continuously, and when hemorrhoids become old and are formed.
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	And I have already said in the division of them the species and signs of them, and thus say those who receive a cure and those that do not receive a cure.
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	I say therefore hemorrhoids and theyls when they are in the depth of the vagina and do not appear to the senses, then in these there shall be no cure made by iron.
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	But those which are in the opening of the vagina upon which one can see with senses, these are those which are cured.
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	And cause the woman to be in a hot bath and then extend it with tweezers or with rough cloth, and insert those with roots.
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	And then powder over them one of the insulating powders without biting, thus with aconite and similar to these.
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	Then put in a pouch their feet for an hour and then place that in cold water.
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	And if the flow of blood continues then do that in a decoction of cummin and of onion peels and of pomegranate peels and of similar things.
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	And take wheat flour and cook it with honey and sour wine and make a poultice with that over the back of it.
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	And if the blood has dried out then it is good; and if not then attach with two leeches and at the breasts no scarification.
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And take wool and immerse that in juice of coriander or in juice of marigold or in juice of wild garlic with red wine and make that adhere to the place until it is healed. And cure the place with ointments until it is healed.
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	But that tail which is of rough guard, cause you to insert that according to what appears to you from that according to what was said in that gouging.
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And cure it until it is healed.
Capitol .lxxiv.	Chapter 74.
De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	Of piercing of a wound in the vagina.
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Many species of ulcers happen in the vagina, thus with bone ulcer and ulcerous ulcer and suppuration and wormy and ragged and others ulcers.
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	And I have already said these diseases and the species of them and their signs and their cures in the division.
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	And cause I to say in this treatise of bone ulcer which comes in the vagina when it is of the ulcers that are congealed and if you want to know how to do its cauterization with iron.
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	Then consider if the pain of the ulcer in its coming is acute with concussion and phlegm and fever, and cause that to be swollen and if you see on it the senses then do not cut it with perforation and cure that with what helps on the maturation until the acuteness of the accidents cease.
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	And then cause you to make the woman lie on one side with her two sides; and recline on her back and join her feet to the part lower than the belly, and let her thighs be extended, and pause her arms under her elbows and let each hold according to what is convenient.
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.
