And the midwife follows the right side and administers the instrument by which is opened the opening of the vagina, the form of which will come in those causes that will be appropriate.
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	And when you want to administer that instrument then cause you to make the depth of the vagina of the woman and what is entered in the vagina of the instrument not more than the depth of the vagina and lead the patient.
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	But if the instrument is larger than the depth of the vagina then cause you to pause powders on the texture of the depth of the vagina so that it be prohibited the entering of every instrument in the depth of the vagina.
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	And cause you to pause the wire which bends in the instrument from the side above and that it be administered by the person who holds the instrument and revolves the wire until the opening of the vagina is open.
E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.	And when the exit is seen and it is touched by the hand and it is cold and moist then cause you to dry that with broad linen.
E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.	And when the pus is evacuated then cause you to pause in the wound a poultice immersed in rose oil or oil with some astringent, and place the poultice in the section on the depth of the vagina.
E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.	And pause wool around the vagina and above the pubic hair clean wool immersed in water in which are boiled mallows.
E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	And let it be cured after two days with ointment convenient to that until it is healed.
E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.	And some are washed the vagina and the wound with water in which is boiled aconite with water and then with water in which is boiled root of lily or of aromatic arnica and then return to the ointment.
E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.	And if the wound is bleeding in the vagina then cause you to be prohibited from the cure of it with iron but have a cure that we have said in the division.
Capitol .lxxv.	Chapter 75.
A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	To teach midwives in what manner the children will be medicated when they come according to non-natural figure.
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.	A necessary cause is that the midwife knows in the beginning the figure of the child's coming according to its signs and it is that when you see the woman pressing on her parts below and wanting to smell the air, and when she is eased by what is above her and the part is made easy for her, and hastens the exit of the child, then know that this part is according to a natural figure, and the exit of it upon its head, and the second one with that or suspended from the navel.
Donc cum tu vezes aquels senhals, lahoras cove que·l ventre de lu sia compremut per so que l’embrio deysenda leugerament quar quan deyssen sobre le sieu cap, deysen a lu la segondina, e es mondada de aquelas superfluitatz am bona mondificacio.	Therefore when you see these signs then cause the belly to be pressed so that the embryo descends gently when he comes out upon his head, and let the second one come with that or suspended from the navel, and it is cleaned of those superfluities by a good cleaning.
Mays aquel que es otra aquest part es no-natural e no-lausable, quar quan le enbrio es eyssit sobre sos pes e·l cos de lu es eyssit devant le cap de lu e·ls pes de lu, e la ma de lu una, o al pe de lu .i., o es eyssit le cap de lu e la ma de lu, o al ventre de lu, e fort leu es convertit sobre le sieu col, e semblant de las figuras de lu no-lausablas.	But that which is another of this part is non-natural and not laudable when the child comes out upon his feet and his body before his head, and his mother's hand or on his foot.I. Or is come out the head of it and his mother's hand or to its belly and bent it is converted over his neck and similar to the figures of it non-laudable.
Don necessaria causa es a la matrona que sia savia e subtil en totas aquelas causas, e que·s guarde de error e de decepcio.	A necessary cause is that the midwife be wise and subtle in all those causes, and that she guard against error and deception.
E yeu so mostrant tota figura de aquelas, e qual engen es en aquelas per so que sia significat per aquo e sia stat sobre aquo.	And I show you the entire figure of those, and what craft is in them so that it be signified by that and is laid upon that.
Quan le feyt es eyssit sobre le sieu cap per egrecio natural, e aquel es vehement sobre la femna e es fayt a lu part dificil, e vezes la vertut de lu ja debelitada, lahoras fay aquela sezer , o que las femnas tenguan lu, e evapora le conh de lu am fenugrec coyt e am olis humitz.	When the child is come out upon his head by natural force and that is violent upon the woman and it is made for him a difficult part, then cause that to be done, or that women hold it, and evaporate the depth of it with fenugreek cooked and with oiled herbs.
E aprop entrometa la metrona entre les sieus ditz espatum petit e fenda am aquel la segondina, o secce aquela am la sua ungla entro que corro aquo que es en ela de humiditat.	And then the midwife put between her fingers a little broad sponge and split it with that the second one, or dry that with its nail until she comes upon what is in her of humidity.
E preme le ventre de la femna entro que deyssenda le fet.	And press on the woman's abdomen where the fetus is descending.
Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.	But if it does not descend, then the woman should be anointed with an ointment of linseed and fennel seed mixed together.
E aprop comanda a lu, aprop le cristeri, que sia compremuda e fay aquela stornudar am condisi; e te la boca de lu e·l nas de lu per huna hora, quar le fet sira foro-getat tantost.	Then command him, the one performing the anointing, to apply pressure and make the mother sneeze with the mixture; and hold her mouth and nose for an hour so that the fetus will come out quickly.
E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.	And if both hands of the fetus are not coming out at the beginning, then you should gently pull them out little by little.
Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.	But if the fetus does not respond to the instrument, then place the woman on a board and lift her feet up, and gently rock the board back and forth on the ground; and the woman should be held so that she does not fall off the board due to the rocking.
E si las mas no son dedintz tornadas e morr le fet, lahoras inscideys aquelas e extratz le romament del fet o lia le cors a la ma de lu am drap e extratz aquel am equalitat, quar aquel sira foro-getat.	And if the hands are not bent back and the fetus is not born, then insert your hand inside and break the fetus's head or grab its body with a cloth and pull it out little by little; for in this way, it will come out.
De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.	About the delivery of the embryo on their feet.
Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.	When the fetus is on their feet, then you should gently push those up and turn the fetus a little, and suck it in, and grab one of its feet and pull it gently.
Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.	But when it has come out between the thighs, then you command him to push it out, and make the mother sneeze with the mixture; for it will come out if God wills it.
E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	And if it is not born with what we have described, then you gently return the fetus little by little to where it was, for it will come out more easily with its natural movement.
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	And if it is not possible with all that we have described, then take myrrh and dissolved gum, and pound them well in the mortar, and apply this to the woman's vagina, at the bottom of her abdomen.
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	Then make her drink tepid water while she is achieving the vapor bath.
E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.	And when his feet are softened, then you give him the smoke of myrrh and place it under him.
E quan te la sub-fumiguacio per una hora, lahoras tu la fay sezer sobre una cezelha, e aprop fay aquela stornudar e extrenh la boca de lu, e levas de aquela, e prem la partida pus bassa del ventre de lu am leugiera compressio, quar le fet sira tantost foro-getat.	And when she has been in the smoke for an hour, then you make her lie down on a board and make her sneeze and open her mouth, and lift up the lower part of her abdomen with gentle pressure, for the fetus will come out at once.
Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.	Delivery of the fetus onto its hands and feet.
Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.	When the fetus is delivered in this way, then you gently pull its hands inside little by little; and the woman should be bent forward, and her feet should be pushed down, and those hands should rest on the ground, and she should complete the delivery.
E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos.	And you gently press on her abdomen little by little and pull what is under his feet from the ears while she is prepared in the lower part.
E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.	And if the fetus is not born, then take his feet and move them violently, and press what is above the hips little by little while the fetus can go to the parts above.
E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.	And you gently pull its hands and suck in the fetus little by little, and command the woman to push while the fetus is born.
Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.	Delivery of the fetus hanging down by one of its hands.
Sia engeniat en reduccio de la ma de lu, mays si no podes aquela reduzir, lahoras eleva la femna e fe aquela anar.	You should gently pull the hand and suck in the fetus little by little; but if you cannot reduce it, then lift up the woman and make her walk.
E si anar no pot, lahoras fay la jazer sobre le lieyt, e concuteys las coyssas de lu am concussio vehement, e aprop aministra liamentz les quals yeu e recomtatz de mucillages.	And if she cannot walk, then make her lie down on the ground and rock her thighs with violent movement; and you should administer to her any remedies that are given by doctors made from mucilage.
E si es vengut le enfantament, lahoras fay aquela sezer sobre cezelha, e aprop studia sobre la reduccio de la ma, e enguala le fet segon figura natural, e fay stornudar la femna e comanda a lu que comprema a si entro que sia foro-getat.	And if the delivery has come, then make her lie down on a board and study the hand's reduction and suck in the fetus according to its natural shape, and make the woman sneeze and command him to push so that it will be born.
Eyssiment del fet sobre·l col expandudas las suas mas e la fassia de lu es al dos de la sua mayre.	Delivery of the fetus on the neck with its hands and face spread out and the fetus' face towards the mother's back.
Cove que la matrona tengua la ma del fet e aprop revolva aquel petit a petit, e eque aquel am facilitat.	Then the midwife should hold the fetus' hand and gently turn it little by little, and this will be easier.
E cum es e quant so es engualhat, e lahoras pausa sobre le conh de lu aquo que havem recomtat de oli e de mucellages.	And when it is turned and how it is sucked in, then you apply to its head what we have recommended of oil and mucilage.
E aprop comandas a lu que·s maugua petit a petit, e quan auras feyt aquo, lahoras fay aquela cezer sobre una cezelha e comanda li que sia inclinada sobre le latz dreyt, e aprop comanda a lu que sia compremuda; e fay aquela stornudar am condizi.	Then command him to grab his mother' hand little by little, and when you have done this, then make her lie down on a board and command him to be bent over the right side, and command him to push; and make the woman sneeze with the mixture.
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	Exit of the fetus prepared on its side.
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	When it comes out of the mother' body in this way, consider and then you insert your finger inside so that it is evacuated from moisture.
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	And if the fetus is suspended over its face and neck, then you insert your finger inside so that it is not retained and delayed.
E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.	Then you gently push the fetus to the sides so that it hangs down as you want, and command the woman to push several times; for it will come out with easy delivery if God wills it.
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	Exit of twins or multiple fetuses.
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	Know that twins are born many times, and sometimes there are three or four; but this is strange and rare, and it does not live.
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And count them; and if they are multiple, there is a second one, and they are separated by the umbilical cord, distinguish those inside the navel of each one of them; and sometimes they are born like this with easy delivery, and sometimes with delivery that is not possible as we have recommended.
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	And if they are difficult to deliver and come to what we have said about the non-natural shapes, then you cure them as we have recorded.
E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.	And if the midwife does what she does with ease and subtlety, and delays, and it is made according to all the forms as it is prepared for him by bringing health.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	Remember that which is formed in the womb from embryos and abortions.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Some are formed in the womb one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, and even ten; and I have verily seen a woman bear six, and another ten, all formed, which cause was made through measurement by the glorious wise ones.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And know that it is in the science of the midwife that which is strong for her to approach this little one like that, and therefore stop it from doing so.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter .lxxvi.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	On the extraction of the fetus when it is dead.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you treat the dead fetus with what we have said in the division of medicine and it is not yet out, then you should consider if the woman is of sound health and not of any of the accidents by which she is feared to suffer harm.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	Then you should have the woman bent over her chest and her head bent down, and her thighs elevated.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	And the midwife should hold that in two parts or be tied in such a way that the body of the fetus does not extend because of the extraction of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	And then you moisten the mouth of the patient with moist oil and with mucilage of alder, fenugreek, and seeds of it.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	And then the midwife anoints her hand with those oils and mucilage, and then inserts her hand smoothly into the vagina, and then seeks with her hand the place where the nails are in the foot.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	And if it is convenient in that case: then you consider whether the foot is prepared so that it descends over his head, and then you place the nails in his heels, or on his neck, or in his mouth, or in his palate, or under his beard, or in the hollow of his chest, or under his armpits.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	But if the descent is on his feet, then it is in the instep, or in the middle of his back.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	And whoever has the nail holds it with his right hand, and places its curve in that place which is between the fingers of his left hand, and inserts his hand smoothly and puts the nail in one of those places we have mentioned, until he reaches the true cause.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	And then place and fix in the aperture of him another nail, or a third if necessary, so that there is an equal attraction, and not extension according to his rectitude only.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	But let the mouth be opened to its full extent, so that the extraction of it is facilitated as it is done in a tooth that is pulled out.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And whoever in him that is between them let the extension be softened; and if any part of him is retained, then let the midwife anoint one of her fingers with oil, and insert that skillfully and turn it about with what is retained.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	So if the part of the foot is dislocated, then let the nails be interchanged into a place that is higher; and do this as long as all of the foot is dislocated.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if the hand is dislocated in front of the other, and it is not possible to reduce that by compressing it, then let a bandage be wrapped around that; and then extract that as long as all of it is dislocated, and insert it into the joint of the hand or in the elbow.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And do this also to the other hand and the two feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	But if the head of the foot is large, or there happens to it compression in its extraction, or there is some constriction on him, then let the midwife insert between the fingers a spatulate and pointed instrument and split the head and extract the fluid, or discover that with an instrument which is named 'alundat', the shape of which will come with the shapes of the other instruments in the chapter which is to come.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	And likewise do if the foot is of a large head by nature: and then let him insert that with a ligature, or take it with an awl as we have said; and then extract the bones with forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head is dislocated and there is constriction due to the collarbone, then let it be split so that the moisture which is in the foot be discharged.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	But if it is not complicated, nor obstinate in its dislocation, then you insert the head immediately as soon as possible to you.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the hernia of the abdomen is ulcerated or is dropping out, then let you pierce that so that the fluid that is in it runs out.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the foot is on his feet, then the attraction of it is greater and the direction of it to the mouth of the vagina is farther.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	But if it is constricted due to the abdomen and the foot, then let you extract that with a bandage which you will have wrapped around your hand, and split the abdomen and the foot so that what is in them runs out.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	But if the other members stand and turn the head, then the midwife inserts her left hand; but if the mouth of the vagina is open, then she inserts her hand in the anus of air, and seeks with that the head, and pulls it with her fingers into the mouth of the vagina, and then inserts into him a nail, or two nails, and pulls him with those.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mouth of the vagina is constricted by an ulcer that comes to the u, then let it not be rubbed on him; but beforehand let the flow of moistening fatty causes be administered.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And administer plasters; and follow the patient with waters that soften and moisten.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the foot is on his side, then if possible let it be turned; and let what we have said about the living foot be administered to him.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, then let it be inserted into wooden stakes, and extracted.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And let there not remain any cause inside the secondina.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed all your operation, then administer what we have said about the cure in ulcerated cauteries that come from the vagina.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if there comes blood flow, then let it be stopped with astringent waters and administer the other cure.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have already seen a woman in whose abdomen was a dead fetus, and then over that other fire burning, and then the dead fire is the other fetus.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	There happened to him an ulcer in his groin; and it was swollen so that fire broke out, and he began to vomit blood.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to his cure, and medicated him for a long time, and the ulcer was not healed.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I applied to him some plasters of strong attraction, and extracted from him a bone, and then passed some days, and extracted another bone; and I was very marvelled, since there was not bone in the abdomen.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I thought that they were the bones of the dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	Then I cut the ulcer, and extracted from him some bones, the woman having remained in the same disposition, and already lived for a long time, a little of the blood flowing.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And I did not think that anything was strange except that in it is science and aid to what the doctor artifices with his hand for cure administers.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of the instruments which are necessary to extract the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	Form of vertigine with which is open the vagina:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of straitness in which are engaged the lips, to that engagement are two virtues in two extremes of two parts.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	But this virtue let it be more subtle of compression, and let it be made of ebony or of wood of boxwood.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And let the thickness of each wood be as two fingers and the margin of either side is one finger, and the length of each is a palm and a half; and in the middle part of two woods are two joints of that woods which are already fitted, of which the length is the measure of a palm and a little more, and the thickness of each is as two fingers, or a little more.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two additions are inserted into the mouth of the vagina so that it is open by them when you turn the two prescribed straitnesses.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Other form also similar to that more subtle and farther:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	Let it be made of boxwood or of ebony according to the likeness of forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	But in the end of it are two additions thus with handles, and the length of those additions is as a palm, and the thickness of each is two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open the womb, then you should let the woman lie on her back with her feet hanging down, and open what is between their thighs.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	Then open your hand with the instrument as you would with forceps according to the amount that you want from the opening of the womb while the midwife does what you ask.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of delivery which the ancients described is:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	Form of delivery by force in which the fetus is forced out:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	Form of extraction with a large head
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it is similar to forceps which have teeth at the end, and sometimes it is made long like forceps according to this form, and sometimes with teeth like a pair of jaws with which it is cut and crushed.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	Form of extraction of a few:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	Form having one thorn:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	Form of one thorn having two thorns:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	Form of forceps whose teeth close to crush the head of the fetus:
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	Form of spatula having two ends, with which the head is cut off:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	Form of two wide spatulas:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All those instruments are exercised, and when they are more numerous and prepared by the artisans, then they are easier for the artisan and better for men because of their quantity.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And whether you have any of those instruments or not, you should be prepared, because the need for them is inexcusable.
De extraccio de la segondina.	Of extraction of the placenta.
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the placenta is retained after childbirth, then you should command the woman to retain her breath, and then make her sneeze with cinnamon, and press your hand over her mouth and nose, and if she vomits it out, that's good.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if not, then you take a bowl and pierce the lining with a knife, and place in it herbs that burn the mouth of the womb, such as hellebore and ruda and anise and camomile and scilla and arabic hellebore and cassia wood and sanderswood.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All these herbs or some of them are submerged in water in the bowl, and place that over the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And then place a straw in the woman's mouth, and hold that while the evaporation comes into the cavity of the womb.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And then make her sneeze as we have said, and the placenta will be forced out with speed.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	But if this cure does not work and it has not come out, then command the midwife to submerge her left hand in sesame oil or in mullein, and then insert that in the vagina and scratch with that the placenta, and when you have found the placenta, take hold of it and pull it out little by little according to rectitude so that the woman does not feel too much pain.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	Before this, make sure that it is moved to the right and left sides with ease.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And then adjust the amount of traction, because she will obey and relax from adhesions.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mouth of the womb is narrow, we have already recommended the cure with sneezing and medication in the bowl with herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	But if it is not forced out with all the causes that we have recommended, then be careful that you do not tire too much on her in iteration of abstraction, but instead what comes out of her mouth lies in the woman's lap, and then close up that with ointment and tetrafarmacon; because that will cause to rot that, then dissolved and forced out.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	But when it is rotten, there comes from it a bad odor to the head and stomach, and then what the woman vomits out lies in her lap; and then let there be administered sub-fumigations and convenient things for that.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	But some of the Ancients have already tested sub-fumigation of netherwort and of dry figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	Form of instrument by which the woman is sub-fumigated because of retention of menstruation and of the placenta:
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It is made of brass or copper.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And the thin end is placed in the vagina and the wide end over the fire, and the sub-fumigation is held over the coals of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And hold that while the sub-fumigation is consumed and iterate another.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	Of cure of the anus of a child not pierced.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	Move children who are born and whose anuses are not pierced, which cause pain and are swollen.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Then let the midwife pierce that with her finger; and if not, pierce that with a pointed spatula, and be careful that it does not touch the clitoris.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And then place over that wool soaked in wine and oil, and cure that with ointment until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	But if you fear that it is swollen, then place in the slit a straw for several days, and hold it when the child wants to urinate.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And then it happens that the swelling of the anus comes from hardening of a boil or abscess; therefore let that hardening be lanced, and then cure that with what we have said about the cure and the poultice.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	Of cure for fistulas that come from below.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	The fistulas that come from below in the perineum are low and thick, which come out near the anus or in the space between the parts.
E es una fistula o motas.	And it is a fistula or many.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And when that hardening becomes old and corrupt by the moist white or purulent discharge, and sometimes these fistulas penetrate some.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And those that penetrate are known by what comes out of them through the opening and by flatulence; and sometimes the woman vomits, and very often it comes out of them vermin.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	And sometimes those fistulas penetrate into the bladder, and into the flesh of the vagina; and sometimes they penetrate into the junction of the hip and into the notch of the anus.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And that in which the fistula penetrates into the anus but does not penetrate is that you put your finger into the anus and insert a pointed probe of brass or iron into the fistula when it is tense.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if in that it is tense, then insert into that a probe of lead or of horsehair until you feel the probe or the bristle in your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you do not feel anything in it nor any sign of discharge or worm or flatulence, as we have said, then know that it is not penetrated, and then go to the cure.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	And when the fistula penetrates into the bladder or into the flesh of the vagina, then its sign is emission of urine from that and prohibition of that towards that which the place is medicated with ointment.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	But if it penetrates into the hip joint or into the bone and causes pain in the circuit of the perineum; and its sign is that the probe goes through there if in it is not tense within the bone, and pain in the circuit of the perineum; and when there is no discharge from there, nor worm, nor flatulence, as we have said, then know that it is not healed with ointment.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	And in all those fistulas there is not a complete cure, and the cure of those is work and labor of the physicians over it who are firmly set.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	But in that which is not penetrating and not old, healing with iron is expected according to what I have told you, and that which I have already tried.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	And let the patient lie on his back and raise his legs up against his chest, with his thighs bent towards his belly, and then insert a probe of lead or of copper into the wound if it is a tortuous fistula, and feel around to find the place where the probe enters.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if the patient is suffering from a hernia in his neck, then you must push your index finger into his neck.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you feel the probe pushing itself in through the opening when you insert it with your finger, then you know for certain that this is a penetrable hernia; and so you should not operate on it, for there will be no cure, as we have said.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	But some people say that this kind of hernia is curable in certain individuals who are thin.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	And the treatment by which recovery is expected in such a case is that you apply a subtle cautery according to the size of the fistula, as mentioned before, and insert this cautery into the hernia around the neck; then repeat this twice or thrice until you know that all the flesh around the hernia, which resembles a feather reed, has been tightened.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	And then treat it with poultices wrapped in cloth until all the flesh around the hernia has healed; and treat the hernia itself with medicines that generate and solidify flesh, and if it is cured, well and good; but if not, no other cure will help.
E si la tenta intra, e no penetra entro·l tieu dit le qual es en le cul, e entre aquel e la tenta que es velament spes de carn o de ciphac, e vezes la fistula en aquo que siec la superficia de la codena, lahoras secca la codena del comensament de la fistula, e tu ve seccan am la tenta, e sia en la fistula entro que la seccio pervengua al loc en le qual perve la extremitat de la tenta, e per la tenta es liberat e catz.	And if the probe goes in and does not go through your index finger, which is placed over the anus, and there is a space between the probe and the flesh or membrane, then cut off the fistula where it touches the surface of the skin; then dry up the skin from the beginning of the fistula, and you will see that it dries up by means of the probe, and let the probe be in the hernia until its end is reached at the place where the probe goes through.
E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	And then clean off the flesh around the hernia which resembles a feather reed, and none of these things should break open.
Mays si flux de sanc vezes que vengua entre tu e la tua opperacio quan ensideysses aquelas carns, lahoras le milh que sia e del pus leugier instrument es cauterizar am foc o am medicina acuta, quar cauteri am foc ajusta bonas doas habitutz: so es adhustio de aquelas carns ajustadas, e abscizio del sanc exseccacio de las humiditatz.	But if blood flows out between you and your operation as you press against those flesh, then the best milky pus-like substance is cauterized with fire or with a sharp medicine; for fire cautery achieves two good things: it dries up those moist flesh around it, and it cuts off the flow of blood.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder o en caus trissat entro que·l loc geta brac, e aprop lahoras cura la plagua am enguentz carn dura engendran e consolidan.	And then treat the hernia with poultices wrapped in cloth or in cheesecloth until the swelling goes down; and then cure the wound with a ointment that generates hard flesh and solidifies it.
E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	And this is how medicines which have astringent and drying properties work: when the swelling has been restored, then it is healed and you need not fear recurrence.
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel.	But if the hernia has permeated into the rectum and is elongated from there to the surface of the body, then insert your index finger into the anus and feel around with it.
E donc si centes la tenta e entre tu e ela es velament de ciphac o de carn, e es propda a la penetracio, lahora no es operacio en lu sino segon via di fiducia e de speransa.	And if you feel the probe and between you and it there is membrane or flesh, and it is close to being penetrable, then this hernia should not be operated on by a direct approach, but only according to the way of confidence and hope.
La qual causa es aministrar en lu una de tres manieyras: o que cauterize aquela ayssi cum havem dit; o que secces aquela entro que consieguas la conquavitat de lu per que sia a tu possible entrometre las qualcas e la curacio propdana; e no procesiscas mot am seccio per so que no inscidas le lacert contenent le cuol, e que accidisque sobre le malaute eyssiment de la egistio ses voluntat; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit quar fort leu sira sanat; o que elongues aquel velament e mondes aquel pus que seccas aquel entro prop le cul, ayssi cum havem dit, o am tenta o am autre instrument de aguda extremitat, e aprop mondifique aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so en la seccio entro la on podes am percrustacio; e aprop esforsa te a far la restauracio de tota la plagua am seccio, e si le orrifici pus desus no es consolidat, e romangua la fistula uberta en la partida del cul, e sira pus leugier per le malaute.	This can be done in three ways: either by cauterizing it as we have said; or by drying up the hernia so that you achieve its cavity and it is possible for you to insert instruments and perform the cure close to the hernia; or by not cutting into the membrane which contains the neck, but by having the patient lean forward from the waist so that the hernia slides down away from the neck without his will, and then cure the hernia as we have said since it is very easy to heal; or by elongating this membrane and cleaning out the pus which has dried up around the anus, using a probe or some other instrument with a sharp end, and then clean off the flesh around the hernia which has been cut through at the place where you can pierce it by pushing in; and then strive to make the whole wound heal by cutting, and if the orifice above is not solidified and the fistula remains open at the anus, then pus will flow out through the hernia.
E alscunas veguadas la fistula es finida segon aquesta manieyra: es quan tu entrometas la tenta en la fistula, e es en le latz del cul entorn la superficia del cos am la codena e en le marge del cul, lahoras pren tenta de perforada extremitat, que es ayssi cum agulha de preparantz les coers segon aquesta forma:	And sometimes the hernia is finished in this way: when you insert the probe into the hernia it is at the side of the anus around the surface of the body and at the edge of the anus, then take a probe with a perforated end, which is made like a needle for piercing ears in this shape:
e entromet en aquela fiel envolopat de v fiels o entorn aquels; e aprop entromet tenta am fiel en la fistula entro que consiegua la conquavitat de lu.	and then insert it into the hernia until you achieve its cavity.
Mays si es penetrant en le marge del cul prop dedintz, lahoras tu extratz le fiel de aquel trauc ayssi que tu intrometas le tieu dit en le cul; e extraguas la extremitat del fiel e ajustes las duas extremitatz essemps, e estrenh cascuna, e leyssa aquo per un dia o per dos, e quan mays inscideys le fiel en la carn, estrenh be aquel entro que aquelas carns sian inscididas las quals so entre doas extremitatz del fiel e que cajan.	But if it is penetrable at the edge of the anus close to the inside, then you must pull out the probe from that wound just as you would insert your index finger into the anus; and pull out the end of the probe and squeeze both ends together, and hold it like that for a day or two, and when you have inserted the probe further into the flesh, squeeze it tightly so that those flesh between the two ends of the probe are pressed in.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia consolidada e sanada.	And then cure the wound until it is solidified and healed.
Mays si le orrifici de la fistula no es penetrant, lahoras fay aquel penetrar, en qualque manieyre sia a tu preparat, sino que sia mot en le preon, quar no es a tu que fassas aquo per que no inscidas le lacert; e aprop fay am aquela entro que sia sanada.	But if the orifice of the hernia is not penetrable, then make it penetrable in whatever way you can prepare it, unless it is in the rectum, for you must not do anything which would pierce the membrane; and then cure it as we have said until it is healed.
La forma de spatum spinos am lo qual es fenduda la fistula: la curvitat del qual es mot aguda e l’autra partida es no-aguda, per so que no inscidas aquo que no es necessari, ayssi cum vezes.	The shape of the spatulum with thorns by which the hernia is split open: one end of it is very acute and the other blunt, so that you do not pierce what need not be pierced.
De sutura de emorroydas en las quals corra sanc en la inscizio de aquelas.	Of suturing up hemorrhoids from which blood flows when they are cut.
Emorroydas so segon dos manieyras, quar o so entre le cul semblantz aysi que es de carbos, o quays aquelas sian cum a gras de rasim.	Hemorrhoids occur in two ways, for either they are between the anus like charcoal or they are like grass with fat on top.
E de aquelas so petitas e grans, e que le sanc corr de aquelas tostemps e es una, e so motas, e so fora·l cul, e en las extremitatz de lu.	And some are small and large, and the blood flows from them at times; they are raised up and are around the anus and at its edges.
Mays empero aquelas que so foro le cul so segon las mes de pauca humiditat, de las quals corr aygua citrina o un petit de sanc am cos continuabla, e so segon la color del cos.	But those which are outside the anus are according to the months of little moisture; from them flows water with a little blood, and they are according to the colour of the body.
E la curacio de aquela que es dedintz le cuol es que comandes al malaute que se assela e que se exprema entro que le cuol yesca e las emoroydas apparescan a tu.	And the cure for those which are inside the neck is to command the patient to sit up and to press in so that the neck dries out and the hemorrhoids appear to you.
Adonc tu te coyte e suspen am uncis o que tenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, e aprop incideys aquelas deves las suas razitz.	Then you must pinch and suspend them with your nails or what you have those with your fingernail, and then cut off their roots.
Mays si les uncis no so tengutz en aquelas per la humiditat de lor e mollificacio de aquelas, lahoras pren aquelas am drap aspre o am coto o am flassada de lana, e extratz aquelas am les tieus ditz, e aprop inscideys aquelas e polveriza sobre lor alcunas polveras caudas aprop la inscizio, per que sian ad aquelas en loc de cauteri; o cauteriza aquelas segon que es precedit en le capitol de cauterizar.	But if the nails are not gripped in them due to their moisture and softness, then take those with a rough cloth or a cord or a strip of wool, and pull them out with your fingers, and then insert them and sprinkle some powdered caustic on them over the cut, so that they are as cauterized; or cauterize them as mentioned in the chapter on cauterizing.
E aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And then cure them with the other cure so that they heal.
E si le cul no obezeys a egressio, lahoras cristerisa le malaute am cristeri en le qual sia mordicacio petita, e sia lavat am aquel aquo que es en le cuol e que obezesca a egressio leugierament quan le malaute s’esprem.	And if the anus does not obey the exit, then castor the patient with castoreum in which there is a small bite, and let it be washed with that which is in the neck and let it obey the exit gently when the patient is squeezed.
Mays si las emorroydas so defora le cul, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiera, e es que tu prenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, o que prenguas aquelas am unci, e inscidas aquelas, e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit entro que sian sanadas.	But if the hemorrhoids are outside the anus, then their cause is looseness, and you must take them with your fingernail or with a needle, and insert them, and then cure them as we have said so that they heal.
E aquel que avoreys inscizio, cove que aministres sutura de lor segon aquesta manieyra: pren fiel envolopat e entromet aquel en agulha e aprop extratz las emorroydas a las partidas dessus, e fay aquel penetrar am la agulha en la razit del autra part, e envolveys las doas extramitatz del fiel en la partida pus dejos de la agulha, e so latitudinalment; e estrenh la emorroyda am strectura fort, e aprop noza le fiel e extratz la agulha.	Here is the translation:
E fay aquo a totas, e layssa de aquelas una e no la cozes, per so que la superfluitat del sanc corra de aquela.	And do this to all of them, leaving one untouched so that the excess blood can flow out from it.
E aprop pausa sobre le cul drap enfus en oli rozat o en cerot; e pausa aquel sobre·l cuol e comanda al malaute que·s repause.	And then place a cloth soaked in rose oil or in cerate over the anus; and have the patient lie down and rest.
E aprop layssa aquela entro que caja; e quan es casuda, cura aquelas am enguentz o am autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then leave that one untouched; and when it has healed, treat those with ointment or some other treatment until they are healed.
De curacio de fistulas.	Treatment of fistulas:
Motas veguadas accideys per exseccacio de fenda o per costriccio de natura.	They often occur due to dryness of the wound or as a result of constriction by nature.
E cum so antiquadas e no val en aquela medicina, lahoras cove que tu razas aquelas am la puncta de spatum o am la tua ungla entro que sian faytas humidas e sia hostada de aquelas la escorsa pus desus, la qual prohibeys aquelas de consolidacio; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian consolidadas.	And when they are old and unresponsive to medicine, then you should pierce them with the point of a spatula or your fingernail so that they become moist and prevent their consolidation; and then treat those that have consolidated.
Lahoras tu osta aquelas am razio pus vehement que la primieyra entro que mot sancno e sian excoriadas; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	Then you should open them with a more violent incision than the first, so that some blood flows and they become raw; and then treat those until they are healed.
De curacio de almesamir, so es clau.	Treatment of syphilis:
Sapias que alamermar, so es clau, e no es si no notz redon segon la color del cors semblant a cap de claviel, e es fayt en tot le cors e majorment en las partidas dejos les pes e als ditz, e endeve per aquels dolor deves le anament.	Know that syphilis, which is the key, is not apparent except for a dark red color on the body resembling the head of a nail, and it occurs throughout the body and mostly in the parts below the feet and the fingers, and because of this you should treat the pain.
E adonc cove que sia inscidit aquo que es en le circuit del clau, e sia tengut am les forfexs o am unci, e sia eradicat de la sua razit; e aprop cura aquel.	And so when it has been pierced in the area around the nail, and held with forceps or tongs and pulled out from its root; then treat that.
E si vols, cauteriza le segont que es precedit en le sieu capitol.	And if you wish, cauterize the second one mentioned in its chapter.
Mays de veruca es eminencia petita aspre fistulada redonda sobre la superficia del cos, e motas veguadas veno en las mas dels enfantz.	Warts are small, rough, round, and fistulous protuberances on the surface of the body, and they often occur in children's hands.
E curacio de lu es que estendas e inscidas aquela, o que estrenhas aquela am fiel o am pel entro que caja.	And its treatment is that you stretch it out and pierce it, or tighten it with gut or string so that it falls off.
E si vols, cauteriza aquo, segon que havem dit, am foc o am medicina acuta.	And if you wish, cauterize it with fire or sharp medicine.
E ja so eradicadas enversas e no-enversas am le instrument le qual yeu diyre.	And thus they are eradicated from all directions using the instrument I have described to you.
Mays formica es eminencia petita feutrada o fistulada grossa sobre la superficia del cos anant mot en le preon, e quan le freg atroba aquela es centit en lu semblant de mordificacio de formigua, e es fayta entorn le cos.	And however, a wart is a small, hard, or fistulous protuberance on the surface of the body, and it often occurs in the palm, and when rubbed, it feels like an ant bite; it is caused by an infestation of ants around the body.
E curacio de lu es que prenguas una canula de pena de auca o de pena de voltor, e sia fort, e pausa aquela sobre la formigua entro que la contengua le cercle de la canula de las partidas de lu; e aprop revolveys la tua ma am la canula entro que inscidas aquo que es en le circuit de la formigua, e pauses aquela en le preon de la carn, e que eradiques la formigua de la sua razit.	And its treatment is to take a needle made of goose feather or peacock feather, which should be strong, and place it over the wart so that the needle contains the area around the wart; then rotate your hand with the needle so that you pierce what is around the wart, and place it in the palm of your hand, and eradicate the wart from its root.
E si vols, fay aquo am canula de eram o de ferr segon aquesta forma:	And if you wish, do this with a needle made of ram's horn or iron according to this form:
Sia la partida desus de la canulha trahent a subtilitat, sorda (so es no-perforada), envolopada per so que sobre le dit la aprencio de lu sia ablaviada e la revolucio de aquela.	Let the part above the needle be drawn out thinly, silently (so that it is not pierced), and wrapped so that when placed on the finger, it appears smooth and the rotation of that.
E si vols cauteriza la formiga segon que es denant dit en la cauterizacio de atheyl en le capitol de cauteri.	And if you wish, cauterize the wart as mentioned before in the chapter on cauterization.
De forma dels instrumentz que so aministratz a dar cristeri.	The form of the instruments that are administered to give a cautery:
Alcunas veguadas es fayt cristeri de argent o de lato o de eram fondut o malleat; e alcunas veguadas es fayt de aquels instrumentz petit e gran segon aquels als quals so aministratz, quar aquel que es aministrat en la curacio dels petitz enfants sia petit; e de aquel dels quals los culs son freuls o doloyrozes, les cristeris de aquels sian petitz.	Sometimes cauteries are made of silver or brass or molten and hammered ram's horn; and sometimes they are made from small and large instruments according to those they are administered, for that which is administered in the treatment of small children should be small; and of those whose anuses are sore or painful, their cauteries should be small.
La forma de cristeri gran e pauc:	The form of a large and slender cautery:
Le cap de la canula de lu desus en le qual es liada la borsa sia ampla segon aquesta manieyra; e sia a lu distinacio la on la borsa es liada ayssi cum vezes.	The head of the needle, above which the pouch is tied, should be made wide according to this manner; and let there be a distinction where the pouch is tied as well as the times.
E la extremitat de lu pus dejus, la qual es entromesa en le cul, sia sorda (so es no-uberta) mot leon, atrasent a subtilita; e en la un del latz de lu sian dos traucs, e en l’autre costat un trauc, e sia la amplesa del trauc segon la groseza dels rays e pus gros un petit.	And the end of it below, which is inserted into the anus, should be silent  (so that it is not open), drawn out thinly; and on one side of it there should be two holes, and on the other side one hole, and the width of the hole according to the thickness of the rays and more coarse one small.
E sia la borsa en la qual sian pausadas las medicinas de vesica de bestia o de pel de ovelha, e la razit de lu sia un palm.	And let the pouch in which are placed the medicines of animal bladder or sheepskin, and its root be one palm long.
E sia perforada per motz traucs ayssi cum es revolvuda; e si l’espazi le qual es entre les traucs la grossetut del dit.	And let it be pierced with many holes so that when it is rolled, the thickness of the finger is between the holes.
E aprop entromet en aquels traucs fiel fort de fiel cru le qual sia de detz fiels, o enviro aquels; e ajusta am aquel la borsa; e quan es pausada en lu la borsa, sia streyt en le cap del cristeri entre dos distingentz am fort costriccio, e aprop cristeriza am aquel quascun trauc: Mays la qualitat de cristerizar am aquel es que tu omples la borsa de la medicina, que sia escalfada segon la quantitat de la tolleransa del malaute; e guarda te que no sia trop cauda ni trop freja.	And then insert into those holes strong thread of hard gut which is made from ten guts, or wrap that around it; and fasten with that the pouch, and when the pouch is placed on it, tighten the head of the cautery between two distinctions with a strong constriction, and then cauterize with that each hole: However, the quality of cauterizing with that is that you fill the pouch with medicine, which should be warmed according to the amount of the patient's tolerance; and beware that it is not too hot nor too cold.
E aprop le malaute sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos, e eleva las suas cambas en sus e pausa dejos lu un cuer sobre le qual ja so les homes o un lansol; e aprop unta la extramitat del cauteri am oli o am album de huou o am mucellage de fenugrec o de semblantz; e aprop entromet aquel en le cul am facilitat, e aprop le ministre prengua la borsa e exprema aquel am doas mas e essemps am vehemencia entro que sia evacuat en le budelh tot aquo que es en le cristeri; e aprop extra le cristeri e le malaute leva las suas cambas a la paret.	And then the patient should lie on his back, and raise his legs up and place underneath him a board or a pillow; and then anoint the end of the cautery with oil or egg white or mucilage of fenugreek or similar; and then insert that into the anus easily, and then take the pouch and squeeze it with both hands strongly so that everything in the cautery is evacuated; and then withdraw the cautery and the patient raises his legs against the wall.
E si la medicina forsa aquel a eyssiment, tengua le tant quant poyra; e si dorm am aquel per tota una nueyt, es mays derier en juvament.	And if the medicine forces him to defecate, he should hold it as long as he can; and if he sleeps with that for a whole night, he is better off.
Mays si tu cristerizas aquel en las malautias de solucio de ventre e l’eyssiment de lu le coyta, lahoras tu itera le cauteri entro que sia sanat.	However, if you cauterize him in the illnesses of looseness of the belly and his defecation stops, then you should repeat the cautery until he is healed.
E si en le cul so emorroydas o apostemas ledens, lahoras sia le cristeri mot subtil e leon, dels cristeris am les quals les enfantz so criterisatz.	And if there are hemorrhoids or abscesses in the anus, then let the cautery be very thin and sharp, of those cauteries with which children are cauterized.
De curacio de las plaguas.	Treatment of piles:
Yeu ja e dit en la divisio de la curacio de las plaguas aquo que convenia al libre, e yeu dic assi la curacio de aquelas am ma e am medicinas segon le conpliment.	You have already said in the division of the treatment of piles what suited the free, and I have thus described their treatment with hand and medicine according to the complement.
Donc dic que las plaguas son diversificadas segon aquo en que son faytas las plaguas e segon le loc sobre le qual cazo las plaquas.	Therefore say that piles are varied according to what they are made of and according to the location where they occur.
E las causas per que motas vetz son faytas las plaguas so ayssi cum getament de peyra, o inscisio d’espaza o de cotel, o percussio am lansa, o am fustz, o am sageta, o semblantz ad aquels de motas causas.	And the causes for which piles are caused are thus: a stone is lodged in the anus or the rectum is pierced by a spear or a staff, or it is struck with a lance, or with a stick, or with an arrow, or similar.
Mays las plaguas que so en les locz del cos so ayssi cum plagua la qual catz sobre le cap, o·l col, o·l pietz, o·l ventre, o·l fitge, e semblantz ad aquels dels membres.	However, the piles that are in the body's locations are thus: a plague which falls on the head, or the neck, or the feet, or the belly, or the buttocks, and similar to those of the limbs.
E yeu so recomtant la curacio de alcunas plaguas per que pauses aquela ratiocinacio e regla sobre las autras plaguas.	And I have recommended the treatment of some piles that stop that reasoning and rule over the others.
E yeu comensare de las plaguas del cap simplas, quar la rememoracio de las compostas vindra al comensament del tertz capitol.	And I will begin the piles of the head simple, for the remembrance of the compounded ones will come to the beginning of the third chapter.
Donc dic que quan accideys en le cap plagua simpla e no es fractura, lahoras considera: si es per getament de peyra o de semblant, e ja ha trinquada la codena tant solament e es gran plagla e temes sobre aquel malaute havinement de apostema caut, lahoras tu te coyta e fleubotoma la cephalica tantost, e no tardas aquo; e extrats ad aquel del sanc segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu si no mes alcuna causa prohibent de fleubotomia, majorment si·l sanc que es eyssit de la plagua es pauc.	I say that when a simple wound occurs on the head and it is not a fracture, then consider: if it is due to a blow from a stone or something similar, and the skin has torn only slightly and there is a large wound and you fear that pus will form, then you must immediately open and flebotomy the cephalica vein, and do not delay this; and extract the blood according to the amount of its virtue if nothing else prohibits flebotomy, especially if the blood that flows from the wound is scarce.
E sia la flaubotomia del contrari de la partida plaguada; e guardase le malaute de replecio e de vi e de viandas grossas.	And it should be a flebotomy on the opposite side of the wounded part; and the patient should be guarded against repletion, wine, and heavy foods.
Mays si de la minuicio prohibeys alcuna causa, lahoras sia aminorat de la vianda e no apropinque a carn ni a vi.	But if some reason prohibits it, then let the food be diminished and do not bring him near meat or wine.
E pausa sobre la plagua, si a lu accideys apostema caut, coto enfus en oli rozat solet o en vi en le qual es stipticat.	And place over the wound, if it happens that pus forms, a poultice soaked in rose oil or wine in which there is a styptic.
Mays si est segur de apostema caut, lahoras pausa sobre la plagua, si es recent am le sieu sanc e le ayre no ha mudat aquela la polvera la qual yeu recomtare aprop petit.	But if he is sure that pus will form, then place over the wound, if it is recent, his own blood and let the air not have changed that powder which I will shortly mention.
E si le ayre ja ha mudada aquela, lahoras pausa sobre alscus enguentz entro que sia sanada.	And if the air has already changed that, then place some ointment on it until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua es gran o es per inscizio d’espaza e de semblantz, e no so ajustadas las labias de lu per puvils, lahoras ajusta aquelas am sutura segon que yeu recomtare de la sutura de lor.	But if the wound is large or it is due to a cut from a sword and similar weapons, and its lips are not joined by threads, then join them with stitches according to what I will mention about their stitches.
Mays si la plagua ja es discuberta del os e pen, e no es retencio de lu sino un petit suspensori, lahoras inscideys aquela e aprop cura la plagua am medicinas e restaura la carn aprop en loc de codena, e comanda al malaute que sia pescut de viandas en las quals es groceza: caps e formen coyt e semblantz a lor, entro que sia compost.	But if the wound is uncovered to the bone and there is no retention of it except for a small bandage, then insert into it and heal the wound with medicines and restore the flesh by applying in place of thread, and order the patient to abstain from foods whose nature is coarse: heads and formen roots and similar things to them, until it is composed.
E si atrobas en la codena putrefaccio e no adhereys al os, lahoras tu inscideys tot aquo poyrit e geta aquo, e aprop cura aquo.	And if you find in the thread putrefaction and it does not adhere to the bone, then cut away all of that rotten matter and throw it out, and heal it afterwards.
Mays si en aquestas plaguas es arteria o vena de la qual fluxs de sanc pot evenir, e no es abscindida per medicinas, lahoras tu inquier sobre la arteria, e si atrobas aquela no-inscidida, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am spatum, o lia aquela; e si necessitat te provoca que aquo que havem dit no comfereys, lahoras tu cauteriza entro que·l sanc sia abscidit.	But if in these wounds there is an artery or vein from which blood can flow and it is not severed by medicines, then probe for the artery and if you find that it is not severed, then pierce it with a spike, or ligature it; and if necessity compels you to do so, cauterize it until the blood is severed.
E si aquestas plaguas son simplas e petitas, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiere; enayssi que tu polverizas sobre aquelas aquesta polvera, quar consolidada aquela denant que l’ayre mude aquelas.	And if these wounds are simple and small, then the cause of them is lightness; therefore you should dust over those this powder, for it will solidify before the air changes it.
E la manieyra de la polvera es aquesta: recipe oli de enses partida una, de sanc de drago partida doas, de caus no-extincta partidas tres; sia tot mot trissat e crivellat, e de lu sia la plagua omplida, e sia constrengida per bona constriccio entro que be sobre aquela aderesca, e sia coagulada am le sanc.	And the manner of the powder is this: take olive oil a quarter part, dragon's blood two parts, and gum arabic three parts; let all be well pounded and sifted, and fill the wound with it, and apply it tightly so that it adheres to the wound and coagulates with the blood.
E aprop strengeys aquela desus am pulvils e leyssa aquela, e no la deslias mentre esta ayssi que no es apostemada, quar no es eredicada de lu la medicina entro que sia sanada.	And then bind it tightly above with lint and let it be so while there is pus in the wound, for if you remove the medicine before it is healed, the wound will not be cured.
E alcuna vetz fa aquo sola cautz, quan no es a tu en present enses e sanc de drago.	And sometimes it does this alone, when there are no dragon's blood or gum arabic at hand.
E ja fa aquesta meteyssa operacio en las grans plaguas quan conveneys que sia pausada sobre aquelas e sian streytas, e so plaguas recentz am le lor sanc, las quals le ayre no ha alteradas.	And this method of operation is also done on large wounds when it seems that it should be applied and the lips of the wound are joined together, and only on recent wounds whose blood has not been altered by the air.
E si le ayre las ha alteradas, e majorment quan es en temps d’estiu, lahoras no es entencio a la posicio de aquesta polvera, mays adonc cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit, enayssi que tu pauses sobre aquelas alcus enguents degistius, o que pauses sobre aquelas pols de la farina del ordi am aygua e mel entro que getan poyredura; e aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And if the air has altered them, especially during the summer, then it is not necessary to apply this powder, but afterwards cure those with what we have mentioned, by applying over them some digestible ointments or pastes made from flour of barley with water and honey so that they form a poultice; and heal them with the other cure until they are healed.
Mays si accideys am la plagua fractura en os, e es petita, lahoras tu extratz aquo am gesti.	But if there is a broken bone in the wound and it is small, then you should extract it with tweezers.
